title: Async Database Fixture
description: Create an async database fixture for testing the Finance Tracker with SQLAlchemy.
instructions:
Complete the database fixture to:
1. Create an async engine with in-memory SQLite
2. Create all tables
3. Provide an async session
4. Clean up properly

hints.text: **Hint:** In-memory SQLite uses `:memory:` as the database name. Use `create_all` to create tables, `dispose()` to cleanup engine, and `rollback()` to discard uncommitted changes.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using synchronous engine instead of async
commonMistakes.consequence: Will block the event loop and may cause test failures

commonMistakes.mistake: Not disposing the engine after tests
commonMistakes.correction: Always await engine.dispose() in fixture cleanup
